name: Goomy
description: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn’t dry out.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
